original_title: Gothic Movie: Good Girls Don't Sleep in Coffins
overview: On a quest to meet girls, a shy loner "Fred" and his roommates score dates via the Internet. But what they didn't expect was their dates to be undead! Packed with an outrageous cast of characters and gags galore, girl-gang leader "Badkitty" and her followers will do anything to empower their lifestyle in the campy comedy-thriller.
title: Gothic Movie: Good Girls Don't Sleep in Coffins
